body: Susan reacts to insults she receives because of her thoughts on politics in Rwanda: "Unfortunately, the Rwandans I am engaging with are outraged. Those loyal to Kagame are offended that I dare compare him to Habyarimana, and those who long for a return to the days of Habyarimana are offended that I compare the Father of their nation to the likes of Kagame."
original_body: Susan reacts to insults she receives because of her thoughts on politics in Rwanda: "Unfortunately, the Rwandans I am engaging with are outraged. Those loyal to Kagame are offended that I dare compare him to Habyarimana, and those who long for a return to the days of Habyarimana are offended that I compare the Father of their nation to the likes of Kagame."
title: Rwanda: Personal attacks puzzle me
